title: Twisted Valentine
description: Kaspian doesn't ask for much, only the undivided attention of the man he's obsessed with. But lately Quin seems preoccupied, and when Kaspian spots him talking to a guy at work, he sees red.Clingy, obsessive, impulsive, and sociopathic, the thought of anyone else getting Quin's attention has Kaspian's blood boiling.What follows is a twisted journey filled with lies, surprises, sex, and ultimately...a bloodbath.Twisted Valentine is a short story that follows the characters from Dysfunctional. This is a dark romance that features content not suited for everyone.
author: Isabel Lucero
